helpInfoC: button can be pressed to search for an existing game or
helpInfoE:
to create your own multiplayer or singleplayer game.

- When the game starts, a guess needs to be entered into the textfield and after pressing the
helpInfoF:
button next to it, information such as right and in right place and wrong and in wrong place can be observed in the table below.

- After guessing the number correctly game is won.

- Scoring is done by taking into consideration the digit count selected, time taken and number of guesses before winning.
